faqs.question: I would like to submit a Peer Insights review. How can I do that?
faqs.answer: Go to www.gartner.com/reviews/survey/vendor-product. If you experience any issues submitting a review, please contact us. You will receive a response back within 3 business days.

faqs.question: I can't find the market/category and vendor I'd like to explore or review - will Peer Insights be expanded to cover more markets/categories?
faqs.answer: Absolutely - please check back later. Our goal is to expand Gartner Peer Insights to cover many more markets/categories. You can suggest a new category to be opened on Peer Insights by submitting this suggestion form. Your suggestion will then be evaluated by the Peer Insights team.

faqs.question: Can I change my Peer Insights review after I've posted it?
faqs.answer: In time you will be able to edit a review directly from the website. For now, if you need to make any edits or changes, please contact us.

faqs.question: Which reviews are approved and what is the moderation process?
faqs.answer: Reviews are assessed to determine whether or not a review meets Gartner Peer Insights' standards for context, quality, and relevance. If a review fails to meet these guidelines, an email is sent to the reviewer asking for additional information, post which it is re-assessed for publication. Please note, it is the discretion of the Peer Insights group to determine how content is approved and published on the site.

faqs.question: If I submit a Peer Insights review, how long will it be before the review appears online?
faqs.answer: There is a moderation process to ensure that all reviews are authentic and readable. If you do not see your review in 10 business days after you submitted it, please contact us.

faqs.question: What information about a reviewer is visible in Gartner Peer Insights?
faqs.answer: The Reviewer Profile contains demographic data about the reviewer and their company, such as job title, role, industry, and company size, but does not include the reviewer's actual name or company name.

faqs.question: How many times may an individual submit a Peer Insights review?
faqs.answer: There is no limit on the number of Peer Insights reviews that an individual can submit - though only one review can be submitted on a given vendor's products in any given market/category.

faqs.question: How do you verify that reviews are from legitimate IT or end-user professionals?
faqs.answer: Reviewers are verified through a multi-step process including completion of a profile with their e-mail, job role, title and details about their organization. For a review to be posted on Peer Insights, the writer must attest to the authenticity of their review and have an identifiable corporate e-mail address.

faqs.question: Can end-users submit Peer Insights reviews?
faqs.answer: We welcome the insights from end-users of products and services, and those individuals may submit a Peer Insights review. They should clearly indicate they are an end-user in the question about their involvement with the product or services.

faqs.question: Do Peer Insights reviews ever expire?
faqs.answer: No, Gartner Peer insights reviews do not expire and will remain readable on the site.

faqs.question: Does Gartner limit the vendors covered in a market/category?
faqs.answer: No. Reviewers may select from a drop-down list of vendors in a market/category or they may select "Other" and write-in a vendor not included in the drop-down list.

faqs.question: What if I see inaccuracies or something else of concern in someone else's review?
faqs.answer: If you have concerns about the accuracy or validity of a review, please contact us.

faqs.question: Do Gartner Research Analysts provide any input into the review questions?
faqs.answer: Gartner Research Analysts helped to develop the baseline survey to ensure a structured, objective and consistent approach to the reviews across markets.

faqs.question: Will Gartner Research Analysts use Peer Insights in their research?
faqs.answer: At this time, individual quotes from Gartner Peer Insights will not be used in published research, presentations or other client interactions. However, Peer Insights reviews will become a new source of information for Analysts.

faqs.question: May I send a private message to the author of a Peer Insights Review?
faqs.answer: No. We are very careful to protect the identity of our reviewers.

faqs.question: How does Gartner collect and display information about a review's source?
faqs.answer: Gartner collects Peer Insights reviews from individuals through direct outreach. Many technology vendors also encourage their customers to review their solutions on Peer Insights.

faqs.question: Do Peer Insights reviewers receive anything in exchange for submitting their reviews?
faqs.answer: Gartner sometimes offers gifts of nominal value to individuals for submitting reviews on Peer Insights, and does not prohibit vendors from doing the same. Nominal gifts are defined as valued at $25 USD or less.

faqs.question: Why is the number of reviews different from the number of ratings?
faqs.answer: In certain cases we allow reviewers to withhold their qualitative review feedback from public view, in order to protect their confidentiality.

faqs.question: How can I ensure that my reviews are published & not rejected on the basis of content quality?
faqs.answer: Reviews must meet the following guidelines to get published. If not they can be removed, at our discretion. Reviewers that violate our guidelines repeatedly, attempt to abuse our program, or are found to be spammers may have their reviews scrutinized & disabled, and may be subject to penalties.

faqs.question: How are Markets and Categories defined?
faqs.answer: Markets and Categories are both collections of software or services of comparable products or service offerings. The difference between Markets and Categories is in how they are defined.

faqs.question: What is Peer Community?
faqs.answer: Peer Community is a digital community platform for verified members to engage in discussions with peers and share meaningful knowledge in real-time.

faqs.question: How does the Peer Community points system work?
faqs.answer: Peer Community is a give-to-get platform. Members earn points at Gartner’s discretion when they submit high-quality contributions to the community that comply with our Guidelines.

faqs.question: How do I ask a question?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the top of the page and click on the Ask a question button. Choose which Department(s) you would like to ask, add relevant Topic tags, and click Post.

faqs.question: How do I add a Poll?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the menu bar at the top of the page and click on the Create a Poll button. Choose which Department(s) you would like to ask, populate Poll Choices, select Poll Type, set recurrence, add Topic tags, and click Post.

faqs.question: I made a post or comment but I don’t see it on the platform — why is that?
faqs.answer: Posts made by unverified users are submitted for review before they go live on the platform; this includes Q&As, Polls and comments.

faqs.question: Where can I find a post that I made previously?
faqs.answer: Q&As and Polls that you originate are saved to your profile. Navigate to the menu bar at the top of the page and click on your avatar. From the drop down menu, click My Content.

faqs.question: How do I know who posted a Q&A or Poll?
faqs.answer: Q&As and Quick Polls are posted anonymously and by design, members are encouraged to leverage this feature by making posts that are secure and judgement free.

faqs.question: How do I view Poll results?
faqs.answer: After a minimum response threshold is met to protect participant contributions. If you create a Poll you will be able to see the results and the list of participants.

faqs.question: How do I filter, download, and share Poll results?
faqs.answer: Members are able to filter, download, and share Poll results by selecting Filter and Share Insights. A pop-up window will appear where you can customize a variety of options.

faqs.question: How do I answer a Q&A post?
faqs.answer: Click on the Comment button located underneath the question. Write your comment and click Post.

faqs.question: I’m unable to comment on a post or participate in a poll — why is that?
faqs.answer: Contribution to Q&A and Poll posts is limited to members whose profiles align to the topic and details of the member who originated it.

faqs.question: How do I access real-time Benchmark Surveys?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Resources under left-hand menu or at the top of the page and select Benchmark Surveys. Click on Take Survey for what topic you’re interested in.

faqs.question: Where can I access One-Minute Insights reports?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Resources under left-hand menu or at the top of the page and select One-Minute Insights. You may filter your search by topic under Filter content by.

faqs.question: Where can I find trending content?
faqs.answer: Logged-in member’s homepage feed will populate Q&As and Polls that have been recently interacted by peers, as well as recently published One-Minute Insight reports.

faqs.question: How do I search for relevant existing insights and posts?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the search bar at the top of the page and utilize for your desired topics or keywords to produce relevant Q&As, Polls, One-Minute Insights, Benchmark Surveys, and User Profiles.

faqs.question: How do I save posts that I’m interested in? Where can I access my saved content?
faqs.answer: At the bottom of each Q&A and Poll post is the option to Save and doing so will privately add the post to your Saved Content.

faqs.question: Who are “Ambassadors”? How can I apply to be one?
faqs.answer: Peer Community Ambassadors are identified by a special designation on their profile. More details about the Ambassador program and a form to apply can be found here.

faqs.question: Can I invite my peers to join the Peer Community?
faqs.answer: Click on the right-hand column in your Peer Community Feed and scroll down until you see a section titled Grow Our Community. Enter one email address and select Invite.

faqs.question: How do I share posts? What will be visible to non-members?
faqs.answer: Individual Q&As and Polls all have an icon to Share at the bottom of the post. Non-members who access links to posts will have limited access to anonymized insights.

faqs.question: Why does my account need to be verified?
faqs.answer: We verify users to ensure that every user knows who they are engaging with at all times and know where the information gathered is coming from.

faqs.question: How do I verify my account?
faqs.answer: To verify your account, please follow the prompts and instructions presented to you while logged into the Peer Community platform.

faqs.question: I already verified my account – why did I lose my verification status?
faqs.answer: Certain changes made to your profile details can cause your verification status to revert. Please again follow the prompts and instructions that are presented to you while logged into the Peer Community platform.

faqs.question: How do I change Expertise in my profile?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the menu bar at the top of the page and click on your avatar. From the drop down menu, click Profile. Click on the edit icon next to Expertise.

faqs.question: How do I add my LinkedIn and Twitter accounts to my profile?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the menu bar at the top of the page and click on your avatar. From the drop down menu, click Profile. Insert your LinkedIn and Twitter profile URLs under Social Handles.

faqs.question: Will my profile be searchable?
faqs.answer: If you choose to opt-in to “profile discoverability” when you first sign in, your profile details will be searchable to all users within Gartner Peer Community and in external search outside of the community.

faqs.question: How do I unsubscribe from Peer Community emails?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the menu bar at the top of the page and click on your profile avatar. From the drop down menu, click My Notification Preferences to edit your notifications preferences.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: To delete your account, please contact peercommunity@gartner.com.

faqs.question: Where can I find general account support?
faqs.answer: For questions or feedback, please contact peercommunity@gartner.com.
